name: Blink
desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

name: Fire Remnant
desc: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 38 seconds, with a max of 3 charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.

name: Primal Split
desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Drunken Brawler
desc: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.

name: Overpower
desc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

name: Searing Chains
desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

name: Shadow Strike
desc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

name: Maledict
desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

name: Spirit Lance
desc: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Phantom's Embrace
desc: Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.\n\nHero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
